scripts.vendor: cat dist/vendor/midi.min.js dist/vendor/inc/shim/Base64.js dist/vendor/inc/shim/Base64binary.js dist/vendor/inc/shim/WebAudioAPI.js dist/vendor/inc/tuna/tuna.js dist/vendor/midi/audioDetect.js dist/vendor/midi/gm.js dist/vendor/midi/loader.js dist/vendor/midi/plugin.audiotag.js dist/vendor/midi/plugin.webaudio.js dist/vendor/midi/plugin.webmidi.js dist/vendor/util/dom_request_xhr.js dist/vendor/util/dom_request_script.js > dist/vendor.js
scripts.dist: npm run main && npm run vendor
scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
